name: Centralmind (Database Gateway)

metadata.readme_excerpt:
![Build Binaries](https://github.com/centralmind/gateway/actions/workflows/build-binaries.yml/badge.svg)           

CentralMind Gateway: Create API or MCP Server in Minutes

ğŸš€ Interactive Demo avialable here: https://centralmind.ai ## What is Centralmind/Gateway Simple way to expose your database to AI-Agent via MCP or OpenAPI 3.1 protocols. ```bash docker run --platform linux/amd64 -p 9090:9090 \ ghcr.io/centralmind/gateway:v0.2.18 start \ --connection-string "postgres://db-user:db-password@db-host/db-name?sslmode=require" ``` This will run
